title: QA Meta: Prompt Corpus â€” Extraction
author: Automation QA
subject:
Extraction Commands:
- Parse lines and boxes in reading order (left-to-right, top-to-bottom).
- Ignore backgrounds, watermarks, and decorative text.
- Return strictly valid JSON (UTF-8, no comments).
- Use array-of-objects for repeated requester info lines.
- Emit `source_spans` with (page, x0, y0, x1, y1) for each field.
creator: QA Generator v4.0

custom.prompts_examples: - Example: `extract(name, business_name, address, city, state, zip, classification, ssn, ein, signature, signature_date)`\n- Example: `redact(SSN, EIN)` but keep placeholders.
custom.validation_rules: No trailing commas; keys in snake_case; dates ISO-8601; numbers as strings if they contain leading zeros.
